events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and will begin evaluation shortly.
The candidate’s application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering based on their software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate’s hiring process.
Initial screening call with the candidate was completed successfully, discussing their experience with software engineering and DevOps methodologies.
Candidate responded promptly with availability for the technical interview and confirmed continued interest in the engineering role.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the lead developer to assess the candidate’s coding and system design skills.
Candidate completed the technical interview impressively, demonstrating strong knowledge in software architecture and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and candidate expectations.
HR interview went well, with the candidate expressing enthusiasm about joining the engineering team and contributing to future projects.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate for the Software Engineer position, including salary, benefits, and start date details.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested minor clarifications regarding flexible working options.
Candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is excited to start as a Software Engineer with our company.
Onboarding process has begun with the candidate, including account setups, introductions, and initial training schedules.
The recruitment process for the Software Engineer position has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded.
